title: Rainbow Zeit 1/16: Houston Astros, Odell Beckham Jr, Christopher Tolkien, Aaliyah, Martha McSally
itunes:title: Rainbow Zeit 1/16: Houston Astros, Odell Beckham Jr, Christopher Tolkien, Aaliyah, Martha McSally
description:
On this edition of Rainbow Zeit Jack and Miles discuss the Houston Astros cheating scandal, Odell Beckham Jr. in hot water for spanking a teammate, Christopher Tolkien passed away at 95, Aaliyah's birthday is today, and Martha McSally goes off on Manu Raju.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
